Class ec.transform.guestloader.GuestTransform 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.guestloader.GuestTransform
public class GuestTransform
extends Object
implements ClassFilter
The GuestTransform class checks classes to ensure they obey the VAT rules. It also makes the transforms necessary for loading into the VAT.

GuestTransform()
GuestTransform(boolean)

isSystemClass(String)
Is the class loadable as a system class.
transformClass(ClassFile)
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system.

GuestTransform 
 public GuestTransform(boolean amLogging)
GuestTransform 
 public GuestTransform()

isSystemClass 
 public boolean isSystemClass(String name)
Is the class loadable as a system class.

Parameters:
name - the Class to check
Returns:
true if the guest loader should load the class as a system class.
transformClass 
 public ClassFile transformClass(ClassFile cf) throws DoNotAdmitException
Transform the given ClassFile as needed to allow it to be admitted into the system. This method performs destructive modifications to its argument. It returns its argument. It throws a DoNotAdmitException if the class does not conform to the requirements for entry to the VAT.

Parameters:
cf - the ClassFile to transform
Returns:
the modified ClassFile.
Throws: DoNotAdmitException
thrown if the class should not be allowed in to the VAT.
